summary: Merged both versions of polymarket-bot/main.py by preserving the best features from both branches: kept TradingBot class name, dry-run mode, signal handlers (SIGINT/SIGTERM), comprehensive bot state tracking, and combined initialization/shutdown logic from both implementations.
strategyUsed: Combined both implementations - preserved feature branch's class name (TradingBot), dry-run mode, RiskManager, and TradeExecutor while incorporating main branch's signal handlers, BotState tracking, responsive shutdown mechanism, and enhanced error handling. Used relative imports from feature branch. Merged logging and metrics reporting from both versions for comprehensive monitoring.
